title: Strengthening Instructional Design Practical Competencies: Language Proficiency Enhancement and Educational Equity Through Collaborative Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and understanding of profession-specific terminology
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners improve their ability to communicate with peers and solve practical language problems through collaborative learning activities.
Learners can propose three or more fairness strategies that consider learner diversity when designing curricula by applying relationship-centered pedagogy.
Learners perform language use appropriate for real-world scenarios (e.g., medical consultations, technical negotiations) in simulation/VR environments with ≥80% accuracy.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
